item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

pkerrr:

can someone show me (or tell me) EXACTLY how to make a shop that uses like “strange tokens” for shop currency only on one shop please

What server are you using?
If its what im thinking, the shops in the file go like…
ID Currency Item Amnt Item Amnt etc So
23 995 1042 100 1038 100 <-- Repeated stock/ammount)
^ ^ ^ ^ Ammount in stock
| | | Product (blue partyhat for the example)
| | What currency the shop takes (995 = coins)
| The shop’s ID.

So to change the currency, just change the 995 to w/e id you want the currency to be.

Read full topic
